lead_paragraph: Jay Cutler threw touchdown passes of 41 and 48 yards and the little-known Glenn Martinez and Andre Hall added to Denver’s slew of big scoring plays last night in a 34-20 victory over the visiting Tennessee Titans that left the Broncos tied for first place in the American Football Conference’s West Division.
